title: Unit tests for context generator
description:
Test coverage for the context generator component.

## Test Cases
- [ ] Successful generation returns content
- [ ] Agent error propagates correctly
- [ ] Timeout cancels generation
- [ ] Empty epic (no tasks) handled gracefully
- [ ] Large output truncated if needed

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Mock agent used for deterministic tests
- [ ] Tests cover success and error paths
- [ ] Timeout test uses short duration
- [ ] No external dependencies (no real agent calls)

## Technical Notes
- Create mock agent in `internal/agent/mock.go` if not exists
- Use context.WithTimeout for timeout tests
